text: Finally , progress in statistical parsing required the development of the Penn Treebank data set ( Marcus et al .1993 ) , the result of many staff years of effort .While it is worthwhile to utilize annotated data when it is available , the future success of learning for natural language systems can not depend on a paradigm requiring that large , annotated data sets be created for each new problem or application .
